title: The Escherichia coli MG1655 in silico metabolic genotype: Its definition, characteristics, and capabilities

abstract: The Escherichia coli MG1655 genome has been completely sequenced. The annotated sequence, biochemical information, and other information were used to reconstruct the E. coli metabolic map. The …
